A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This film had so much potential for greatness. Sadly\, Rey's lack of any character\, Kylo Ren is just whiny kid with teen angst ("He didn't like my helmet... waa waa...") and Luke is not the jedi badass we all deserved; he's just a grumpy old man who dies like a fart in the wind. Only redeeming features were a cool fight in the throne and a Yoda force ghost scene.

Rian Johnson should never be allowed anywhere near the franchise again.

Can Disney stop thinking about turnover and actually allow the fans to make the film they've always wanted?
